broadcast.tips.hoe: 🔔 <color:#FCE7C8>Visste du? En hoe vil automatisk plante beskjæringen din!
broadcast.bugs: 🐛 Fant en feil? Rapporter den på <color:#FCE7C8><click:open_url:'https://github.com/SkyRealmDE/bugreports/issues'><hover:show_text:'Click me'>GitHub!</hover></click></color>
broadcast.feedback: 💬 Har du en innføring i <color:#FCE7C8><click:open_url:'https://discord.gg/RHky8tfJZr'><hover:show_text:'Click me'>Discord!</hover></click></color>
broadcast.tips.trypremium: 🔑 <color:#FCE7C8>Try premium features with <white>/premium</white>! Unlock even more perks at <click:open_url:'https://store.sky-realm.com'><hover:show_text:'Click to open store'><white>our store</white></hover></click>.</color>
broadcast.tips.generator: ⚒️ <color:#FCE7C8>Oppgrader din generator via <white>/realmer</white> → <white>oppgraderer</white> → <white>generator</white> og øk din ressurs produksjon!</color>
broadcast.tips.automation: 🚀 <color:#FCE7C8>Master automation to skyrakket dine profitter. En liten planlegging kan føre til store gevinster!</color>
broadcast.tips.inviteFriends: 🤝 <color:#FCE7C8>You can invite friends to your realm with <white>/realm invite \<name\></white>. Play together and share the fun!</color>
broadcast.tips.shadyNpcs: <color:#FCE7C8>Noen NPCer er skygge og betal mindre for samme produkt. Sammenligne priser før salg!</color>
broadcast.tips.dirtSmelt: 🔥 <color:#FCE7C8>Du kan smelte jord inn i sand. Hvem sier at du ikke kan gjøre om deg til noe nyttig?</color>
broadcast.tips.crushCobble: 🔨 <color:#FCE7C8>Klær brostein inn i sand for å lage og bygge, eller handle!</color>
broadcast.tips.mud: 🌀 <color:#FCE7C8>Mix water with sand or dirt to create mud—it's a key ingredient for various recipes!</color>
broadcast.tips.dryMud: 🌞 <color:#FCE7C8>Dry mud in the oven to get dirt. It's a clever way to cycle resources!</color>
broadcast.tips.mcCrafter: 🔧 <color:#FCE7C8>As of Minecraft 1.21, the new crafter block can auto-craft any recipe for you!</color>
broadcast.tips.bamboo: 🎋 <color:#FCE7C8>Bamboo is a speedy alternative source of wood. Grow it fast, craft it easy!</color>
